name: Send data to an HTTP endpoint for every new Typeform response
description: Streamline your data collection process by automatically sending responses from Typeform to your desired endpoint using HTTP. With this template, every time a new event with responses is recorded in Typeform, Make will seamlessly transmit the data, ensuring you never miss valuable insights. Perfect for integrating Typeform with other applications or services, this workflow enhances your data management and response handling efficiency.
